clauses.title: Internship Position
clauses.body: {{company_name}} (the 'Company') offers {{intern_name}} (the 'Intern') an internship position as {{internship_role}} from {{start_date}} to {{end_date}}. This is a learning opportunity designed to provide practical work experience{{#if educational_institution}} in connection with studies at {{educational_institution}}{{/if}}.

clauses.title: Duties & Learning Objectives
clauses.body: The Intern will work approximately {{hours_per_week}} hours per week, assisting with projects and tasks related to {{internship_role}}. The Company will provide supervision, training, and mentorship to support the Intern's professional development. The Intern agrees to complete assigned tasks diligently and professionally.

clauses.title: Compensation
clauses.body: The Intern will receive {{compensation}} for this internship. {{#if compensation != 'Unpaid'}}Payment will be made monthly in arrears.{{/if}} The Intern may be eligible for reimbursement of reasonable pre-approved expenses with receipts.

clauses.title: Confidentiality
clauses.body: The Intern agrees to keep all Company information, projects, and business matters confidential during and after the internship. The Intern may not share confidential information with anyone outside the Company without permission. This obligation continues after the internship ends.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.body: Any work product or materials created by the Intern during the internship belongs to the Company. The Intern assigns all rights and ownership to the Company. The Intern may use the experience and general skills gained for educational and career purposes.

clauses.title: Supervision & Feedback
clauses.body: The Company will provide appropriate supervision and regular feedback to support the Intern's learning. The Intern should raise any concerns or questions with their supervisor promptly. The Company may provide a reference or letter of completion at the end of the internship.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.body: Either party may terminate this internship with 7 days' written notice. The Company may terminate immediately if the Intern breaches this agreement or behaves inappropriately. The Intern will return all Company property and materials upon termination.

clauses.title: Relationship
clauses.body: This internship does not create an employment relationship or guarantee future employment. The Intern is not entitled to employee benefits unless explicitly stated. {{#if educational_institution}}This arrangement may fulfill academic requirements as agreed with {{educational_institution}}.{{/if}}

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.body: This Agreement is governed by the laws of England & Wales. Both parties agree to resolve any disputes through good-faith discussion first.

clauses.title: Signatures
clauses.body:
By signing below, both parties agree to the terms of this Internship Agreement.

Intern: _________________ Date: _______

Company Representative: _________________ Date: _______

annotations.tooltip: Ensure compliance with minimum wage laws - unpaid internships have strict requirements.
Clarify this is not an employment relationship to avoid misunderstandings.
